channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Litter Under Railway Bridge Upper Wickham Lane, 14th February
item.description:
For over a month, rubbish thrown over the steel fence under the railway bridge, close to Lidl store at Upper Wickham Road, Welling are still there and mounting up now.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): William Foster Lane, Welling, Greater London

item.title: Pothol quit big and getting bigger, 14th February
item.description:
There is a bigger pothole. And it is getting bigger. Especially in this weather. We have fire trucks coming in , ambulances quite a lot to the seniors flat blocks at the end and its getting worse. Also damaging the wheels of cars. Had to change tyre.

item.title: Rubbish and tree bags cans that have been dumped, 14th February
item.description:
I would like to formally complain about a rubbish and tree bags that have been dumped in our area. This situation is not only unsightly but also poses potential health I kindly request that the responsible department arrange for the immediate removal of the dumped materials and take appropriate action to prevent this from happening again.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 84-93, Tovil Close, Anerley, Greater London

item.title: Dustbins left on the pavement, 14th February
item.description:
